links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..50
Index entries for sequences related to factorial numbers
mathematica: RecurrenceTable[{a[1]==1, a[n]==((6^n - 1) * a[n-1])/5}, a, {n, 15}] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Oct 25 2012 *)Table[QFactorial[n, 6], {n, 15}] (* _Bruno Berselli_, Aug 14 2013 *)
prog: (MAGMA) [n le 1 select 1 else (6^n-1)*Self(n-1)/5: n in [1..15]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Oct 25 2012
